entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
